review: This device is excellent, streams content well, and works good with BubblePnP Android App.
author: Abdullah A.

review: One of the best products I have ever owned.
author: Nidoking

review: When it works it is great, but it sometimes does not work with the Netflix app on iOS... The "cast" icon randomly disappears and it is a mystery as to why it will not work and how to get it to work again. Three stars only because the price is so low. It may be worth it to someone on a budget willing to deal with this problem.
author: Dan

review: I tried this chrome and it worked really well with my note 3 and the TV. I tried my computer and the TV and was not having as much luck. I will see what I am doing wrong and try again.
author: Cindy schipper

review: Bought it for my son.  I think he likes it so it must work good.
author: Angela Coe

review: Works well. Easy to set up.
author: Alice L. Micka "Alice"

review: Got it to work once and never again could I get it past my routers firewall.  Plus navigating the web without a keyboard, touchscreen or mouse is not ideal.
author: Sgreg

review: When it works I love it.  The first week was great, then I was gone for a few weeks and the next couple of weeks since then every day I have to unplug and plug in chromecast for it to show up on my tv.  I also have had troubles casting since then and need to close down all the apps, reopen them and try to recast and that usually works.  If it had no oddball bugs every single day it would be great, but... This was really just to test it out anyway, it pretty much failed, so... Getting 2 Apple tv's to replace it and sending my chromecast to my guest room or workout room instead.
author: Lrdmn
